summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Herbalife CRM - Backend APIs fully functional (100% success), Frontend login/authentication issues preventing dashboard access

ui_bugs.issue: Login form submission not working - modal remains open after credentials entry, no error messages displayed
Frontend login does not establish session despite backend login API working correctly
Cannot access /dashboard routes - redirects to home page even after registration

integration_issues.issue: Registration appears successful but subsequent login fails to authenticate
Frontend login modal not properly communicating with backend /api/login endpoint

design_issues.issue: Login modal has overlay interception issues requiring force=True for clicks

passed_tests: Backend: Team APIs (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE /api/team)
Backend: Customer APIs (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE /api/customers)
Backend: Lead APIs (GET, POST, PATCH, DELETE /api/leads)
Frontend: Login modal opens and accepts input
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix frontend login authentication flow. Backend APIs are fully functional but frontend cannot establish authenticated sessions. Issues: 1) Login modal submission not working properly 2) Frontend-backend authentication integration broken 3) Dashboard routes inaccessible due to auth failures. All CRM functionality depends on resolving these authentication issues first.
